channel.title: Comments on: Traditional First Hot Day delays

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Today was a fairly special day many may have forgotten about the Venus crossing the Sun today, well at my work we all managed to see this speck zooming acros the sune, projected onto a piece of paper through bonoculars. So a strange day, plus with no air con at work my air con was an ice lolly thanks to my manager, I've never had Lime & coconut flavour before!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Today was a fairly special day many may have forgotten about the Venus crossing the Sun today, well at my work we all managed to see this speck zooming acros the sune, projected onto a piece of paper through bonoculars. So a strange day, plus with no air con at work my air con was an ice lolly thanks to my manager, I’ve never had Lime & coconut flavour before!!
